h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister
content: There's a large pit in the middle of this courtyard, but before you follow Zhu Bajie down, check the large altar on the other side of the pit, and you'll be able to claim a **Celestial Jade Lotus Pill** to increase your maximum health!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister'.
The content is as follows:
There's a large pit in the middle of this courtyard, but before you follow Zhu Bajie down, check the large altar on the other side of the pit, and you'll be able to claim a **Celestial Jade Lotus Pill** to increase your maximum health!
